price: We gave Moses the Scripture and appointed along with him his brother Aaron as a helper.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَا مُوسَى ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ وَجَعَلۡنَا مَعَهُۥٓ أَخَاهُ هَٰرُونَ وَزِيرٗا

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
